Name: Dagger
Description: a small blade with a small handle

Name: Club
Description: a heavy stick with a thick end

Name: Axe
Description: a tool typically used for chopping wood

Name: Spear
Description: a weapon with a long shaft and a pointed tip used for thrusting or throwing

Name: Hammer
Description: a tool with a heavy metal head mounted at right angles at the end of a handle

Name: Quarterstaff
Description: a stout pole six to eight feet long

Name: Rope
Description: a simple rope about 10 feet long
